title: Classic User Created Webhook Schema
description: Sent whenever a new user is created in SaaSquatch program where the classic program is enabled.

imageUrl.title: Image Url
imageUrl.description: The URL to an image of this user

firstSeenIP.title: First Seen IP
firstSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were first seen by SaaSquatch

lastSeenIP.title: Last Seen IP
lastSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were most recently seen by SaaSquatch

dateCreated.title: Date Created
dateCreated.description: A timestamp of the date this user was created

referable.title: Referable
referable.description: True if this user can be referred in a program by other users

referredByCodes.title: Referred By Codes
referredByCodes.description: Any codes used to refer this user

cookieId.title: Anonymous Cookie User Id
cookieId.description: The anonymous cookie user identifier associated with this user if applicable (see anonymous users)

dateBlocked.title: Date Blocked
dateBlocked.description: The date the referral was blocked

customFields.title: Custom Fields
customFields.description: Any custom fields set for this user

segments.title: User Segments
segments.description: Any segments this user belongs to
